name: qsv-index
description: Create an index for a CSV. This is very quick (even the 15gb, 28m row NYC 311 dataset takes all of 14 seconds to index) & provides constant time indexing/random access into the CSV. With an index, `count`, `sample` & `slice` work instantaneously; random access mode is enabled in `luau`; and multithreading is enabled for the `frequency`, `split`, `stats`, `schema` & `tojsonl` commands.

options.description: Write index to <file> instead of <input>.idx. Generally, this is not currently useful because the only way to use an index is if it is specially named <input>.idx.
